attributes.action: Introduce "Nutrition and Health" education to the primary/national curriculum
attributes.additional_details: Food awareness programmes should be part of primary/national curriculum to avoid obesity and allow most of us to understand and make informed choice of “Reference Intake (RI)” (formerly known as “Guideline Daily Amount (GDA)”) mentioned in the super-market food products.
attributes.background: Obesity and other eating disorders are rapidly becoming national problem nevertheless has got enough media attention.  The worrying official figures can be referred at http://www.hscic.gov.uk/catalogue/PUB16988
